page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE cont.
page.content: Occasionally unusual visitors ,like the photographer,call at school,and last week some P7's were given their B.C.G. vacination by the doctor. Fortunately I wasn't one of them. At three o'clock school ends and I rushed home to do my homework as today I was anxious to watch my favourite T.V programme Dungeons and Dragons. When it was over I went up to the nearby fields to play with my cousin Richard . We lit a fire and I fell into a river so my mother scolded me and sent me to bed early.
